name: Crawler (JamesSheppard)
description:
My first game jam game - made for the Bitter Game Jam, where the only sprites you can use are given to you.

Crawler is a dungeon-crawler game, where you have to reach the end without losing all your lives. However, there are different types of gravity and movement in different rooms, and the final boss battle cycles through each of these ways of moving.

Different ways of movement in the game:

- No gravity, dungeon crawler

- Normal jumping (platformer)

- Jumping continuously (Like flappy bird)

-----------------------

Controls:

WASD = move

Space = Jump

Left Mouse Button = shoot

-----------------------
